title: NTLive Shakespeare's Twelfth Night (2017)
description:
Twelfth Night (or what you will) by Wm. Shakespeare performed by The National 
Theatre Live (2017)

Run Time 2 hrs 39 mins for the play in two files at interval

                                 Subtitles in English or Russian from
                                  your VLC or other player for the play and     
                                        featurette presented by Kirsty Lang.
IMDb  tt6845890

Summary from NTLive

Viola is washed ashore but her twin brother Sebastian is lost. Determined to 
survive on her own, she steps out to explore a new land. So begins a whirlwind 
of mistaken identity and unrequited love. The nearby households of Olivia and 
Orsino are overrun with passion.

Cast and Creatives

Directed for the stage by Simon Godwin
Directed for the screen by Robin Lough

Viola                      Tamara Lawrance
Sebastian                  Daniel Ezra
Orsino                     Oliver Chris
Curio                      Emmanuel Kojo
Valentine                  Brad Morrison                   
Sir Toby Belch             Tim McMullan
Maria                      Nicky Wardly
Captain and Priest         James Wallace
Sir Andrew Aguecheek       Daniel Rigby
Antonio                    Adam Best
Feste                      Doon Mackichan
Olivia                     Phoebe Fox
Malvolia                   Tamsin Grieg
Fabia                      Imogen Doel

complete cast list in the credit roll

My Notes

  The setting for this Twelfth Night is contemporary but it does not detract 
from the story.  Indeed with Tamsin Grieg and Malvolia they have given a new 
twist to the role playing in the play.  The featurette has some interviews 
but I would read those after viewing. 

  Down a couple pages You can find Shakespeare's Globe on Screen Twelfth Night.  In that production Mark Rylance plays Olivia to a standing- with- no- elbow- room audience of the only Globe dvd performance using "original practices."  As you can see the role playing in the NTLive show has a certain kind of mirror effect with the original practices version at the Globe.

Notes written  November 26th  2017
